General.Name: Suzhou Longjie Special Fiber Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Longjie Special Fiber Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polyester filaments in China and internationally. It offers differentiated polyester filament, PTT fiber, recycled environmental protection fiber, including FDY, POY, DTY composite yarn, and other differentiated product process categories, as well as high/super-simulation animal fur polyester fibers, such as imitation wool and imitation rabbit fur. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China. Suzhou Longjie Special Fiber Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhangjiagang Longjie Investment Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Zhangjiagang Economic Development Zone, Zhangjiagang, China, 215600
